com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp
This is the base package of the application.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.configuration - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.configuration
This package contains configuration classes.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller
This package contains classes which respond to incoming HTTP requests patterns.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.dto - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.dto
This package contain classes carrying model data from view technology.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.entity - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.entity
This package contains classes which are persisted in the database
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.exception - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.exception
This package contains custom exception classes and exception handlers.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.model - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.model
This package contains classes for de-serializing data provided by the api.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.repository - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.repository
This package contains interfaces which interacts with the database.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.security - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.security
This package contains configuration classes related to security.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service
This package contains classes which performs critical and major operations.
com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.util - package com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.util
This package contains utility classes like form validators.
configure(AuthenticationManagerBuilder) - Method in class com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.security.SecurityConfig

CustomizedNewsController - Class in com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller
this controller is used to map custom news articles list
CustomizedNewsController() - Constructor for class com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.controller.CustomizedNewsController
 
CustomizedNewsService - Class in com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service
This class is used to fetch articles of categories the user is subscribed to.
Since the news map is huge, and it requires a lot of computation power to filter articles of categories the user is subscribed and put it in a list on every request,
the scope of the class is set to session, meaning this bean will be created for every new session.
CustomizedNewsService() - Constructor for class com.herokuapp.newsfeedapp.service.CustomizedNewsService
